archiefmat.titel: Resoluties van de gewone en grote kerkeraad betreffende de Lutherse gemeente te Suriname, vanaf 1816 van de commissie
archiefmat.titel_eng: Resolutions of the ordinary and large Consistory concerning the Lutheran congregation in Suriname, since 1816 of the Committee
archiefmat.notes: For the period 1740-1742 the contents are identical to no. 1319. In no. 1320, however, relevant incoming and outgoing letters and papers are added. Contains an index that is kept until 1771.
